definition: (bird species of China) red-crowned crane (Grus japonensis)
red/pellet/powder/cinnabar

apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc
crane

sentences.english: Red-crowned cranes dance the most beautiful dances in the world of birds.
sentences.chinese: 丹顶鹤是在鸟类中跳舞最美的。

sentences.english: One never tires of watching lovely red-crowned cranes.
sentences.chinese: 优雅的丹顶鹤令人百看不厌。

sentences.english: A song named the story of the red-crowned crane was specially composed for her.
sentences.chinese: 一首名为丹顶鹤的故事是特别为她。

sentences.english: If you have the chance to pay a visit to the hometown of the red-crowned cranes in person, you will surely be impressed.
sentences.chinese: 如果你有机会参观丹顶鹤的故乡，你肯定会被打动。

sentences.english: These birds are all raised by humans.
sentences.chinese: 这些丹顶鹤啊，都是人工饲养的。

sentences.english: People often draw red crowned crane and pine together.
sentences.chinese: 人们经常把丹顶鹤与松树画在一起。

sentences.english: The image of the Red-crowned Crane can be seen in many places in China.
sentences.chinese: 丹顶鹤的图案可以在中国很多地方看到。

sentences.english: You can't see red-crowned cranes in other parts of the world.
sentences.chinese: 世界其它地方你是看不到丹顶鹤的。

sentences.english: So it is the longest-living of all bird species. For centuries, cranes have been revered in China as symbols of longevity.
sentences.chinese: 丹顶鹤的寿命有六十年，它是鸟类中的寿星。

sentences.english: Daniel, during the breeding season, the red-crested cranes live solitarily .
sentences.chinese: 大牛，丹顶鹤在繁殖的时候啊是要独居的。

sentences.english: The pathogeny of death of the red_crowned cranes proved to be Candida glabrata by experiments and studies.
sentences.chinese: 经实验研究确定其为丹顶鹤致死病原。

sentences.english: Red-crowned cranes are one of the world's most endangered species.
sentences.chinese: 丹顶鹤是世界上濒临灭绝的物种之一。

sentences.english: Red-crowned cranes dance the maximum beautiful dances in the globle of birds.
sentences.chinese: 丹顶鹤是在鸟类中跳舞最美的。

sentences.english: Red-crowned 5 cranes are one of the world's most endangered species.
sentences.chinese: 丹顶鹤是世界上濒临灭绝的物种之一。

sentences.english: Qiqihar is home to the red-crowned crane.
sentences.chinese: 齐齐哈尔是丹顶鹤的故乡。
